level-0.title: No Loyalty Status
level-0.description: If your ratio of accumulated rKSU to USDC deposits is less than 1%, then you are not entitled to any privileges.

level-1.title: Loyalty Level 1
level-1.subtitle: If your ratio of accumulated rKSU to USDC deposits is between 1% - 5%, then you can enjoy the following benefits:

list.list-0: Second order priority access to lending pools (behind Loyalty Level 2).
list.list-1: Second order priority for capital withdrawals from lending pools (behind Loyalty Level 2).
list.list-2: 0.1% additional APY from your deposits in all lending pools, awarded in KSU.

level-2.title: Loyalty Level 2
level-2.subtitle: If your ratio of accumulated rKSU to USDC deposits is 5% or more, then you can enjoy the following benefits:

list.list-0: First order priority access to lending pools.
list.list-1: Firstly order priority for capital withdrawals from lending pools.
list.list-2: 0.2% additional APY from your deposits in all lending pools, awarded in KSU.

loyaltyLevels.title: Loyalty levels
loyaltyLevels.subtitle: About the loyalty program
loyaltyLevels.description-1: The more you lock, the higher your loyalty level and the more benefits you receive.
loyaltyLevels.description-2: If you do not wish to lock KSU tokens, then you are can still participate in lending pools to earn APY. However, you will not receive any bonus APY, and any deposit/withdrawal request will be processed after Loyalty 1 and 2 Token Lockers.
loyaltyLevels.description-3: Each KSU token that you unlock will burn a proportionate amount of rKSU. In order to maintain your loyalty level and associated privileges, be sure to maintain an amount of locked KSU to avoid burning rKSU to the point that it falls below the above minimum ratio of USDC deposits.

reviewLock.unlockingSchedule: Unlocking request will be scheduled to the end of the current Epoch.

deposit.title: KSU Locking
deposit.metric: Locking Amount at Current Exchange Rate

reviewLock.depositSchedule: Locking request will be scheduled to the end of the current Epoch.

history.label: Lending History
history.tooltip: The total length of time the Pool Delegate has been operating as a lending business.

totalFunds.label: Total Loan Funds Originated
totalFunds.tooltip: ​Total USDC equivalent amount of loans that the Pool Delegate has deployed since its inception, regardless of whether they have been made available on Kasu or not. ​

totalLoans.label: Total Loans Originated
totalLoans.tooltip: ​Total number of individual loans that the Pool Delegate has deployed since its inception, regardless of whether they have been made available on Kasu or not.​

assetClasses.label: Asset Class(es)
assetClasses.tooltip: All lending specialisations, types or categories in which the Pool Delegate has a track record and expertise, regardless of the Pools available on Kasu by the Pool Delegate.​

otherPools.label: Other KASU Pools
otherPools.tooltip: ​Other Lending Pools that the Pool Delegate has made available on Kasu.​

loans.label: Loans Under Management
loans.tooltip: Total USDC equivalent amount within this Lending Pool that is deployed into loans to end borrowers.​

loss.label: Historical Loss Rate
loss.tooltip: ​Total losses expressed percentage of total loans originated by the Pool Delegate since its inception, regardless of whether they relate to Lending Pools made available on Kasu or not. ​

apy.label: APY
apy.tooltip: The current Annual Percentage Yield offered by the Pool Delegate within this Tranche (in the case that there are multiple Tranches within this Pool). In the absence of multiple Tranches, then this reflects the APY that Liquidity Providers are currently earning within this Lending Pool. This assumes all repayments will be made as expected.

assetClass.label: Asset Class
assetClass.tooltip: The lending specialisation, type or category related to this Lending Pool.

exposureIndustry.label: Industry Exposure
exposureIndustry.tooltip: ​Industry and/or business category in which the Pool Delegates customers (end borrowers) operate.​

structureApy.label: Pool APY Structure
structureApy.tooltip: Indicates whether the APY earned by Liquidity Providers is fixed for a specified period of time, or variable.​

term.label: Pool Investment Term
term.tooltip: The duration of the Lending Pool. 'Open Ended' has no fixed term or duration and is considered ongoing. A fixed term or duration has an end date, at which time it is intended that the Liquidity Pool will reach maturity and all Liquidity Providers will be fully repaid (subject to losses).

loan.label: Loan Structure (End Borrowers)
loan.tooltip: ​The structure of each loan provided by the Pool Delegate to its customers (end borrowers). A Revolving Loan refers to a loan structure that that has no defined end date as it is utilised to fund ongoing operations (akin to a Line of Credit, Working Capital Loan or Evergreen Facility). An Amortising loan refers to a loan structure that has defined Principal and Interest repayment periods until it is fully repaid upon a specific end/maturity date.

valueLocked.label: Total Value Locked (TVL)
valueLocked.tooltip: Total USDC equivalent amount deposited into this Lending Pools.​

management.label: Loan Funds under Management
management.tooltip: Total USDC equivalent amount within this Lending Pool that is deployed into loans to end borrowers.​

yield.label: Total Yield Earned
yield.tooltip: Total yield you have earned on your USDC investment(s) whilst you remain active in this Lending Pool. For example, if you withdraw your total investment from this Lending Pool (and are therefore no longer active in this Lending Pool), then your total yield earned will be displayed as zero. To view a breakdown of your total yield earned across all Lenidng Pools, please click on the 'My Portfolio' tab.

activeLoans.label: Active Loans
activeLoans.tooltip: Total number of loans that the Pool Delegate currently has deployed within this Lending Pool.

capacity.label: Pool Capacity
capacity.tooltip: ​Amount of additional funds the Lending Pool can accept in USDC, also represented as a percentage of the maximum Pool target amount.​

firstLoss.label: First Loss Capital
firstLoss.tooltip: ​The amount of capital contributed by the Pool Delegate that will be absorbed first in the event of any losses, prior to losses being absorbed by Liquidity Providers, thereby providing a degree of loss protection to Liquidity Providers.​

lossRate.label: Pool Loss Rate
lossRate.tooltip: ​Total losses expressed percentage of total loans originated by the Pool Delegate within this Lending Pool. ​

guarantees.label: Director(s) Guarantees
guarantees.tooltip: ​A legal undertaking enforced by the Pool Delegate over the Director(s) of its customer(s) (end borrowers) that places liability into the hands of the Director(s), where in the case that the business cannot repay its loans, the Director(s) is/are personally liable for this debt.

chargeAssets.label: Charge over Business Assets
chargeAssets.tooltip: ​A legal security interest held by the Pool Delegate  over the assets of its business customer, providing the Pool Delegate with the right to enforce its interest in the event of default or insolvency.

bankControl.label: Control over Bank Accounts
bankControl.tooltip: Whether the Pool Delegate has auto/direct debit over its customers' (end borrowers) bank accounts with the right to automatically draw cash funds to recover any loans in default.

yearsBusiness.label: Minimum 3 years in Business
yearsBusiness.tooltip: A condition which requires a Pool Delegate's customer (end borrower) to prove that it has been operating for at least 3 years with adequate financial reporting history.

propertyOwners.label: Directors must be property owners
propertyOwners.tooltip: ​A condition enforced by the Pool Delegate which requires at least one Director of Pool Delegate's customer (end borrower) to be a property owner to confirm a minimum level of wealth in order to provide comfort the event that a Director may become personally liability for its business loan(s) where recovery action may be required.

repayments.title: Repayments
repayments.loadModelDescription: This Pool Delegate's lending model is to facilitate Fiat currency loans to real world businesses off-chain. The Asset Class and Loan Structure outlined in the 'Pool Details' screen indicates that these loans are 'Revolving/Evergreen' Loan Facilities, with fluctuating loan balances, being a function of ongoing and simultaneous loan repayments and loan redraws in Fiat currency off-chain. Accordingly, these Fiat currency transactions can only be viewed via CSV download at this current point in time.
